answers.answer: Hope everything goes welll i also have gestational diabetes but my baby at a perfect weight they were going to induce me but shes at a good weight so there not so good luck girl (:

Im 38wks 4days. Its just everything hitting me all at once. I was dealing with high bp ok but the gestentional diabetes added on is a bit too much for me to soak in. I see my mom deal with it everyday and when she gets sick im there for her and that disease is serious
it should go away once u have the baby hun that's wat happen to my cousin she had it but soon she had her baby it went away
That gives me hope ♥ well im in the hospital now so we'll see what the plan will be

Well if they do induce at least your far enough along that little one shouldn't have any complications at all. And gestational diabetes along with your high bp should go away right after delivery. I have high bp too and I'm in the beginning stages of preeclampsia. I'm only 33 weeks. And if I get preeclampsia all the way I'll be hospitalized on full bed rest until I can safely deliver at 37 weeks. Stay strong mama. All will be well! Your body is going through enough, and stressing will only raise your bp lol ;)
Your so right. But they are going to induce me Saturday night
Im in the same boat with you hunny! But at least you will have your baby sooner in your arms!♡ are they gunna make you have a c section or vaginally?
GD goes away after pregnancy. Don't stress :)

question: Im at the doctors and I have gestational diabetes on top on high blood pressure so now they are all talking about inducing me. I know I wanted my baby out but this info is scaring me. Im alone in a room praying for things to go smoothly
title: upset
